## PinComponent type

A functional component that can be used to render a custom marker on the map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type PinComponent<T> = (props: {
    index: number;
    mapbox: mapboxgl.Map;
    result: Result<T>;
}) => JSX.Element;
```
